description: Repository is incapable of effectively determining the extent to which staff are capable of achieving business objectives.
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Establish internal means of assessment including risk management
- Seek relevant external certification in order to demonstrate staff competence
- Undertake regular staff development reviews
name: Inability to evaluate staff effectiveness or suitability
notes: - Does the repository maintain policies and procedures to review staff performance?
preMitigationNotes: - Repository has no record of performance levels of individuals within its staff or means to effectively identify training requirements
